revised_title: Infra-Red Absorption Spectra of Ammonia, Phosphine, and Arsine
tldr: This article presents a study of the infra-red absorption spectra of ammonia, phosphine, and arsine. The authors describe the experimental setup, the absorption bands found in these gases, and the relationships between the bands. They also discuss the fine structure of the bands and the different sequences observed in each gas's spectrum.
